languages.text:
Репутацию у торговцев можно повысить, сдавая им заполненные до 100% грузы с различными предметами.
Приобретение предмета у торговца не расходует никаких ресурсов, но имеет либо один из двух, либо оба требования: уровень {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}фактора прибыли{/g} и уровень репутации.
Предмет может быть приобретен только в том случае, если все требования выполнены.
Начиная со второй главы Вольный Торговец сможет связываться с торговцами через своего Высокого фактотума на мостике пустотного корабля.

You can improve your reputation with merchants by turning in full loads of various cargo.
You do not spend any resources when purchasing items from merchants, but you do need to meet either one or both of the following conditions: a certain level of {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g} and reputation rank.
Items can only be purchased when all of the requirements for doing so are satisfied.
Starting from Chapter 2, the Rogue Trader will be able to contact merchants by speaking to the High Factotum on the voidship's bridge.
languages.original_text:
Репутацию у торговцев можно повысить, сдавая им заполненные до 100% грузы с различными предметами.
Приобретение предмета у торговца не расходует никаких ресурсов, но имеет либо один из двух, либо оба требования: уровень {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}фактора прибыли{/g} и уровень репутации.
Предмет может быть приобретен только в том случае, если все требования выполнены.
Начиная со второй главы Вольный Торговец сможет связываться с торговцами через своего Высокого фактотума на мостике пустотного корабля.

traits.locale_text:
You can improve your reputation with merchants by turning in full units of various cargo.
You do not spend any resources when purchasing items from merchants, but you do need to meet either one or both of the following conditions: a certain level of profit factor and reputation rank.
Items can only be purchased when all of the requirements for doing so are satisfied.
Starting from Chapter 2, the Rogue Trader will be able to contact merchants by speaking to the High Factotum on the voidship's bridge.

You can improve your reputation with merchants by turning in full units of various cargo.
You do not spend any resources when purchasing items from merchants, but you do need to meet either one or both of the following conditions: a certain level of profit factor and reputation rank.
Items can only be purchased when all of the requirements for doing so are satisfied.
Starting from Chapter 2, the Rogue Trader will be able to contact merchants by speaking to the High Factotum on the voidship's bridge.

Items can only be purchased when all of the requirements for doing so are satisfied.
Starting from Chapter 2, the Rogue Trader will be able to contact merchants by speaking to the High Factotum on the voidship's bridge.

You can improve your reputation with merchants by turning in full loads of various cargo.
You do not spend any resources when purchasing items from merchants, but you do need to meet either one or both of the following conditions: a certain level of {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g} and reputation rank.
Items can only be purchased when all of the requirements for doing so are satisfied.
Starting from Chapter 2, the Rogue Trader will be able to contact merchants by speaking to the High Factotum on the voidship's bridge.

You can improve your reputation with merchants by turning in full loads of various cargo.
You do not spend any resources when purchasing items from merchants, but you do need to meet either one or both of the following conditions: a certain level of {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g} and reputation rank.
Items can only be purchased when all of the requirements for doing so are satisfied.
Starting from Chapter 2, the Rogue Trader will be able to contact merchants by speaking to the High Factotum on the voidship's bridge.

languages.text:
Du kannst deinen Ruf bei Händlern verbessern, indem du volle Ladungen verschiedener Fracht lieferst.
Du verbrauchst beim Kauf von Gegenständen bei Händlern keine Ressourcen, aber du musst entweder eine oder beide der folgenden Bedingungen erfüllen: eine gewisse Stufe des {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}Profitfaktors{/g} und des Rufs.
Gegenstände können nur gekauft werden, wenn alle Bedingungen dafür erfüllt sind.
Mit Beginn von Kapitel 2 ist es dem Freihändler möglich, Händler durch das Ansprechen des Hochfaktotums auf der Raumschiffbrücke zu kontaktieren.
languages.original_text:
You can improve your reputation with merchants by turning in full loads of various cargo.
You do not spend any resources when purchasing items from merchants, but you do need to meet either one or both of the following conditions: a certain level of {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g} and reputation rank.
Items can only be purchased when all of the requirements for doing so are satisfied.
Starting from Chapter 2, the Rogue Trader will be able to contact merchants by speaking to the High Factotum on the voidship's bridge.

traits.locale_text:
Du kannst deinen {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}Ruf{/g} bei Händlern verbessern, indem du volle Ladungen verschiedener Fracht lieferst.
Du verbrauchst beim Kauf von Gegenständen bei Händlern keine Ressourcen, aber du musst entweder eine oder beide der folgenden Bedingungen erfüllen: eine gewisse Stufe des {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}Profitfaktors{/g} und des Rufs.
Gegenstände können nur gekauft werden, wenn alle Bedingungen dafür erfüllt sind.
Mit Beginn von Kapitel 2 ist es dem Freihändler möglich, Händler durch das Ansprechen des Hochfaktotums auf der Raumschiffbrücke zu kontaktieren.

languages.text:
Pour améliorer votre réputation auprès des marchands, remettez-leur des chargements complets de diverses cargaisons.
Pour acheter des objets auprès des marchands, vous n'utilisez pas de ressources, mais vous devez remplir l'une ou l'autre des conditions suivantes, voire les deux : un certain niveau de {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}facteur d'influence{/g} et un rang de réputation.
Les objets ne peuvent être achetés que si toutes les conditions requises sont réunies.
À partir du Chapitre 2, le libre-marchand pourra entrer en contact avec des marchands en s'adressant au haut factotum sur la passerelle du vaisseau spatial.
languages.original_text:
You can improve your reputation with merchants by turning in full loads of various cargo.
You do not spend any resources when purchasing items from merchants, but you do need to meet either one or both of the following conditions: a certain level of {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g} and reputation rank.
Items can only be purchased when all of the requirements for doing so are satisfied.
Starting from Chapter 2, the Rogue Trader will be able to contact merchants by speaking to the High Factotum on the voidship's bridge.

traits.locale_text:
Pour améliorer votre réputation auprès des marchands, remettez-leur des chargements complets de diverses cargaisons.
Pour acheter des objets auprès des marchands, vous n'utilisez pas de ressources, mais vous devez remplir l'une ou l'autre des conditions suivantes, voire les deux : un certain niveau de {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}facteur d'influence{/g} et un rang de réputation.
Les objets ne peuvent être achetés que si toutes les conditions requises sont réunies.
À partir du Chapitre 2, le libre-marchand pourra entrer en contact avec des marchands en s'adressant au haut factotum sur la passerelle du vaisseau spatial.

Pour améliorer votre réputation auprès des marchands, remettez-leur des chargements complets de diverses marchandises.
Pour acheter des objets auprès des marchands, vous n'utilisez pas de ressources, mais vous devez remplir l'une ou l'autre des conditions suivantes, voire les deux : un certain niveau de {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}facteur de profit{/g} et un rang de réputation.
Les objets ne peuvent être achetés que si toutes les conditions requises sont réunies.
À partir du Chapitre 2, le Libre-Marchand pourra entrer en contact avec des marchands en s'adressant au Haut Factotum à la passerelle du vaisseau.

languages.text:
您可以将满载的货物交给商人，提高您在该派系的声望。
当您从商人那里购买物品时，您不需要耗费任何资源，但您的{g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}利润因子{/g}与声望等级必须满足条件。
只有当您满足所有条件之后，才能购买物品。
从第二章开始，行商浪人可以与舰桥处的高阶顾问交谈，获得新的雇佣兵。
languages.original_text:
You can improve your reputation with merchants by turning in full loads of various cargo.
You do not spend any resources when purchasing items from merchants, but you do need to meet either one or both of the following conditions: a certain level of {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g} and reputation rank.
Items can only be purchased when all of the requirements for doing so are satisfied.
Starting from Chapter 2, the Rogue Trader will be able to contact merchants by speaking to the High Factotum on the voidship's bridge.

traits.locale_text:
您可以将满载的货物交给商人，提高您在该派系的{g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}声望{/g}。
当您从商人那里购买物品时，您不需要耗费任何资源，但您的{g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}利润因子{/g}与声望等级必须满足条件。
只有当您满足所有条件之后，才能购买物品。
从第二章开始，行商浪人可以与舰桥处的高阶顾问交谈，获得新的雇佣兵。

languages.text:
Puedes mejorar tu reputación con los mercaderes suministrándoles cargamentos enteros de distintas mercancías.
Al comprar artículos a los mercaderes, no consumes ningún tipo de recurso, pero sí que debes cumplir una o ambas de las siguientes condiciones: cierto nivel de {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}factor de beneficio{/g} o cierto rango de reputación.
Algunos artículos solo se pueden comprar cuando se cumplen todos los requisitos para ello.
A partir del capítulo 2, tu Comerciante Independiente podrá contactar con mercaderes hablando con el Sumo Factótum en el puente de la nave del vacío.
languages.original_text:
You can improve your reputation with merchants by turning in full loads of various cargo.
You do not spend any resources when purchasing items from merchants, but you do need to meet either one or both of the following conditions: a certain level of {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g} and reputation rank.
Items can only be purchased when all of the requirements for doing so are satisfied.
Starting from Chapter 2, the Rogue Trader will be able to contact merchants by speaking to the High Factotum on the voidship's bridge.

traits.locale_text:
Puedes mejorar tu {g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}reputación{/g} con los mercaderes suministrándoles cargamentos enteros de distintas mercancías.
Al comprar artículos a los mercaderes, no consumes ningún tipo de recurso, pero sí que debes cumplir una o ambas de las siguientes condiciones: cierto nivel de {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}factor de beneficio{/g} o cierto rango de reputación.
Algunos artículos solo se pueden comprar cuando se cumplen todos los requisitos para ello.
A partir del capítulo 2, tu Comerciante Independiente podrá contactar con mercaderes hablando con el Sumo Factótum en el puente de la nave del vacío.

languages.original_text:
Reputation can be increased at merchants by handing them cargoes filled to 100% with various items.
Purchasing an item from a merchant does not consume any resources, but has either one or both of two requirements: Profit Factor level and Reputation level.
An item can only be purchased if all requirements are met.
Starting in Chapter 2, the Free Trader will be able to contact merchants through his High Factotum on the bridge of the void ship.

languages.text:
満タンのカーゴを商人に引き渡すことで評価を上昇させることができる。
商人からアイテムを購入する際に資源は消費しないが、一定レベルの{g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}利益因子{/g}または評価ランクのいずれか一方または両方を満たす必要がある。
必要条件が全て満たされた場合にのみアイテム購入が可能となる。
第二章以降は、ローグトレーダーはヴォイドシップのブリッジの上でハイ・ファクトタムに話し掛けると商人と連絡できるようになる。
languages.original_text:
You can improve your reputation with merchants by turning in full loads of various cargo.
You do not spend any resources when purchasing items from merchants, but you do need to meet either one or both of the following conditions: a certain level of {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g} and reputation rank.
Items can only be purchased when all of the requirements for doing so are satisfied.
Starting from Chapter 2, the Rogue Trader will be able to contact merchants by speaking to the High Factotum on the voidship's bridge.

traits.locale_text:
満タンのカーゴを商人に引き渡すことで{g|Encyclopedia:Reputation}評価{/g}を上昇させることができる。
商人からアイテムを購入する際に資源は消費しないが、一定レベルの{g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}利益因子{/g}または評価ランクのいずれか一方または両方を満たす必要がある。
必要条件が全て満たされた場合にのみアイテム購入が可能となる。
第二章以降は、ローグトレーダーはヴォイドシップのブリッジの上でハイ・ファクトタムに話し掛けると商人と連絡できるようになる。

languages.text:
Tüccarlara çeşitli kargo türlerinden %100'ü dolu paketler teslim ederek onların gözündeki itibarını artırabilirsin.
Tüccarlardan eşya satın alırken herhangi bir kaynak harcamazsın ancak şu koşullardan birini veya her ikisini birden sağlaman gerekir: Belirli bir {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}kâr faktörü{/g} seviyesi ve itibar kademesi.
Bir eşya yalnızca tüm gereksinimler karşılandığında satın alınabilir.
Hür Tacir, 2. Bölüm'den itibaren uçsuz gemisinin köprüsündeki Arşıkâhya'yla konuşarak tüccarlarla iletişime geçebilir.
languages.original_text:
You can improve your reputation with merchants by turning in full loads of various cargo.
You do not spend any resources when purchasing items from merchants, but you do need to meet either one or both of the following conditions: a certain level of {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g} and reputation rank.
Items can only be purchased when all of the requirements for doing so are satisfied.
Starting from Chapter 2, the Rogue Trader will be able to contact merchants by speaking to the High Factotum on the voidship's bridge.
